Digital communication increasingly mediates moments of vulnerability, yet most systems still gauge performance through efficiency or sentiment polarity rather than emotional safety.  Support agents, automated tools, and moderation teams often have no shared method for distinguishing balanced empathy from unhelpful extremes of detachment or over‑identification.
